sections.heading: Appeal; cost bond; cash deposit; appellate proceedings; dismissal
sections.text: On appeal in any case taken from the district court to the Court of Appeals or Supreme Court, other than an appeal pursuant to section 71-6904, the appellant or appellants shall, within thirty days after the entry of the judgment, dec

sections.heading: no exceptions to the requirement of filing bond; case dismissed where county did not file bond or make application or showing for an extension of time to file the required bond
sections.text: County of Hall v. Engleman, 182 Neb. 676, 156 N.W.2d 801 (1968).
